statements: SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 'a7d36705-57e5-4e6c-836f-d69f00a2c876';
SELECT encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 'c12eda8d-8c7e-49de-a0f6-9fde042f95ea';
SELECT key_id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = '12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef';
SELECT encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = '98765432-10fe-dcba-4321-fedcba098765';
SELECT key_id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT key_id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id IN ('12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef', '98765432-10fe-dcba-4321-fedcba098765');
SELECT COUNT(key_id) AS total_keys FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT payment_id, encrypted_data FROM payment_information;
SELECT payment_id, encrypted_data FROM payment_information WHERE payment_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT key_value, key_id FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM payment_information JOIN encryption_keys ON payment_information.encryption_key_id = encryption_keys.key_id;
SELECT key_id, COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM encryption_keys GROUP BY key_id HAVING total_entries > 1;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id IN (SELECT encryption_key_id FROM payment_information);
SELECT id, key_name, encryption_key FROM payment_keys;
SELECT name_on_card, expiration_date FROM card_info WHERE cvv = 123;
SELECT * FROM transaction_log WHERE action = 'purchase';
SELECT CONCAT(key_name, ' - ', encryption_key) AS key_details FROM payment_keys;
SELECT card_number, name_on_card, expiration_date FROM card_info ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT key_name, encryption_key FROM payment_keys WHERE key_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT card_number, name_on_card, expiration_date FROM card_info WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_log WHERE action = 'purchase' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_id, action, description FROM transaction_log WHERE description IS NOT NULL AND description <> '';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, key_type FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_type = 'AES';
SELECT user_id, card_number FROM payment_info WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_type = 'symmetric';
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_info JOIN transactions ON payment_info.payment_id = transactions.payment_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT cardholder_name, card_number FROM payment_information WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE expires_at > NOW();
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT payment_id, cardholder_name, expiration_date FROM payment_information WHERE expiration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
